mapper.select: select vac_no as vacNo, E.emp_no as empNo, vac_title as title, vac_start_date as startDate, vac_end_date as endDate, vac_days as days, manager_no as managerNo, vac_status as status, vac_memo as memo, vac_created_date as createdDate from erp_employees E, erp_vacations V where v.vac_status = #{value} and E.emp_no = V.emp_no;
